document_data.mainbody:
Fruug, was a servant of Zariel who served her alongside Florenta and her flame, the tiefling named Karlach, during her time in the Nine Hells in the late 15 century DR.
When Karlach Cliffgate escaped the Hells in the  abroad a spelljammer ship, Florenta sent sulphur-reeking notes to Toril. One such note that found Karlach talked about Fruug getting stuck in a butter barrel and, when his little imp tried to help its master, both plummeted into a volcano to Florentas amusement. Flo laughed so hard that Zariel sent her out of the room.
